title: Research youth soccer club donation support
description:
Dave's local youth soccer club needs donations: https://www.givebacks.com/donate/hzrpc
1. Research the club and the GiveBacks platform
2. Come up with ways BMO can help (promotion ideas, outreach, etc.)
3. Email findings to Dave's personal email address

Note: Need Dave's personal email address before sending.

actions.note: Researched HZRPC (Hereford Zone Rec Council, northern Baltimore County 501(c)(3)). Key finding: only 2.9% of $1.4M revenue from donations - huge untapped potential. Emailed comprehensive findings with 30 actionable recommendations to daveh@outlook.com via bmo@bmobot.ai.
